def sum_even_ways(N, M):
    return N * M

N, M = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
print(sum_even_ways(N, M))


def sum_even_ways(n, m):
    return n*m

n, m = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
print(sum_even_ways(n, m))

def sum_even_ways(N, M):
    return N*M

N, M = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
print(sum_even_ways(N, M))


N, M = map(int, input().split())


print(N * M)

N, M = map(int, input().split())

print(N * M)

N, M = map(int, input().split())

print(N * (M - 1) + 1)


A, B = map(int, input().split())

print(A * B)
